articles.title: Europe heatwave: Thousands escape wildfires in France, Spain and Greece - BBC
articles.description: Residents and visitors flee towns and villages in France, Spain and Greece as high winds fan fires.
articles.content:
By Paul KirbyBBC News
Residents and holidaymakers have fled towns and villages in France, Spain and Portugal as fires are whipped up by high winds and tinder-dry conditions.
More than 11,000 people… [+4392 chars]
